t: Clorox gives Brita one to two years to improve | Reuters
s: May 25, 2007 - Clorox Co. <CLX.N> is giving its slow-growth businesses such as Brita about a year or two to improve before deciding whether they are worth keeping, the company's new chief executive said on Thursday.
